name: Get Facebook posts
description:
Add Facebook-IDs as nodes, e.g. "Tatort". 

Gets 10 postings at maximum, all from the 22nd of July 2013. 

Notice: the until-parameter always has to be one day later, the day starts at 0:00am.

See https://developers.facebook.com/docs/reference/api/page/ and https://developers.facebook.com/docs/reference/api/post/
